trans-unit.source: Defines objects used to fill the interiors of graphical shapes such as rectangles, ellipses, pies, polygons, and paths.
trans-unit.target: Define os objetos utilizados para preencher os interiors das formas gráficas como retângulos, reticências, pies, multilinestrings e caminhos.

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract base class and cannot be instantiated.
trans-unit.target: Esta é uma classe base abstrata e não pode ser instanciada.

trans-unit.source: To create a brush object, use classes derived from Brush, such as <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>, <xref:System.Drawing.TextureBrush>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush>.
trans-unit.target: Para criar um objeto de pincel, utilize classes derivadas de pincel, tais como <xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>, <xref:System.Drawing.TextureBrush>e <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush>.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientBrush> </xref:System.Drawing.TextureBrush> </xref:System.Drawing.SolidBrush>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, creates an exact copy of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituí-lo de uma classe derivada, cria uma cópia exata <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The new <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> that this method creates.
trans-unit.target: A nova <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> que cria este método.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Versões de todos os recursos utilizados por este <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Calling Dispose allows the resources used by this <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> object to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: Chamar Dispose permite que os recursos utilizados por este <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>o objeto a possível reatribuir porque para outros fins.</xref:System.Drawing.Brush>

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>.
trans-unit.target: É possível chamar Dispose quando tiver terminado de utilizando <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>.</xref:System.Drawing.Brush>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: O método de Dispose deixa o <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>num Estado não utilizável.</xref:System.Drawing.Brush>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Depois de chamar Dispose, tem de libertar todas as referências para o <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>para que o recoletor de lixo pode reclame a memória que a <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>foi occupying.</xref:System.Drawing.Brush> </xref:System.Drawing.Brush>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [recursos não geridos limpeza](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementar um método eliminar](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Sempre chamada eliminar antes de libertar a última referência <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>.</xref:System.Drawing.Brush>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, os recursos que está a utilizar não irão ser libertados até que as chamadas de recoletor de lixo a <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>do objeto `Finalize` método.</xref:System.Drawing.Brush>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Liberta os recursos não geridos utilizados pelo <xref href="System.Drawing.Brush"> </xref> e opcionalmente liberta os recursos geridos.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é denominado pelo público `Dispose()`método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`invoca protegida `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro for true, este método versões retidos por quaisquer objetos geridos de todos os recursos que este <xref:System.Drawing.Brush>referências.</xref:System.Drawing.Brush>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método invoca o `Dispose()` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Para libertar recursos geridos e; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para libertar recursos apenas não geridos.

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Permite que um objeto para tentar libertar recursos e efetuar outras operações de limpeza antes de que reclamada a através da recolha de lixo.

trans-unit.source: In a derived class, sets a reference to a [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] brush object.
trans-unit.target: Uma classe derivada, define uma referência para um [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] objeto pincel.

trans-unit.source: A pointer to the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] brush object.
trans-unit.target: Um ponteiro para o [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] objeto pincel.
